name: Zombie Killer Trigger Happy Mercenary
summary:
Zombies have attacked!

Your goal is to survive for as long as you can! Run, Jump, Slash, Slide and Shoot your way through the zombie hordes as you fight to SURVIVE!

Compete with your friends in multiplayer battles and see who really would last the longest!

Unlock characters that have Bigger and B
info:
• 中文名: 僵尸杀手
  • 平台: IOS
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1
